description: This app is very beautiful and clean, with a simple interface that is fairly easy to wrap your head around. That is about where the good things stop though. Really this seems to have just taken the artboard, rectangle, and circle tool out of Inkscape and made them their own app for no apparent reason. Really it has basically no features, and on top of that it is really buggy. You cannot even select multiple objects at once to perform basic boolean operations, even though they are meant to be usable. It would be nice to see some standard artboard sizes based on phones/tablets or something like that also. I guess I am not really sure why this program exists unless it was like an undergrad's thesis project or something, because really it does nothing you can't do easier in Inkscape.
summary: A stripped down version of Inkscape

description: Happy to see it's released. But anyone who is willing to install now (25.04.20) remember, it is still under development and bugs are expected everywhere!

I haven't tested this app yet but... I've been following it's development. It's crazy to have any criticism to a application that is not even in alpha state... just give it time, the project is great for UI/UX developers. Don't even compare with inkscape, it has a completely different goal a user target. Great project to be supported. It will be 'Sketch' for linux users...
summary: I haven't tested this app yet but..

description: If you have money please donate to the author.
summary: Give it a shot, in the future it will be better than inskape

description: It is understably not fully functional yet but the UI feels good. I'm sure it will be a good competitor after a while.
Under develop app of vector graphics. Like Sketch on Mac and so on. Thanks that you try to create simple tool to create Ui and graphics on Linux.
https://github.com/akiraux/Akira It is still in alpha we are so near of releasing the Beta Version
summary: STILL IN ALPHA VERSION GO TO GITHUB REPO TO SEE THE PROGRESS

description: К сожалению, приложение достаточно сырое, я очень надеюсь, что у разработчика всё же получится сделать достойный продукт.
